name: REMAP Scotland Web
body:
### This Document 

Just a simple guide to help simplify things so following the progress of the work is a clear and straightforward job.

Q. What is the repository anyway?

A. Essentially it is just a folder containing a 'package' in our case the package is a web application which will contain the website and database archives of REMAP Scotland and its cases. The main branch is often referred to as 'master'... Shall we move on?

#### The 'web' Repository
[web](https://github.com/remapscotland/web)
This is where the work you see published on http://remapscotland.org.uk goes. 
Nothing should go on the site without being pushed to 'master' on this repository

#### The 'wip' Repository
[wip](https://github.com/remapscotland/wip)
The wip repository is for 'work in progress'. The site is too young to start using it yet but expect most work to move there once we have a structure which complies with accessibility standards and holds enough content to qualify as a suitable front end.

#### The 'remapGit' Repository
[remapGit](https://github.com/remapscotland/remapGit)
This repository is for miscellaneous useful scripts. I could not think of a good name at that time, sorry.

#### Issues
[web/issues]( https://github.com/remapscotland/web/issues)
This is where bugs will be tracked and filed and also where feature requests will be made and discussed among the developers.

#### Wiki: Introduction/Welcome Page
[/wiki/REMAP-Scotland-Web](https://github.com/remapscotland/web/wiki/REMAP-Scotland-Web)
This is the general description of the plans and the organisation management of REMAPScotland at github and on-line.

#### Links: Useful Web Resources
[Useful-Web-Resources](https://github.com/remapscotland/web/wiki/Useful-Web-Resources)
Exactly that.

#### History: Wiki
[wiki/_history](https://github.com/remapscotland/web/wiki/_history)
This is the history of the wiki

#### History: Commits
[commits/master](https://github.com/remapscotland/web/commits/master)
Is where the changes to  you can see, I write a brief sentence for every new commit I make so it is easy to go back to an older version if needed

#### Features and Enhancements
[web/issues/milestones](https://github.com/remapscotland/web/issues/milestones)
We can set milestones to help us focus on tasks over a realistic time period.

###### Current
The current version is 0.0.1, which means small milestones must be achieved by 0.0.2 
The first set of specific, achievable tasks to aim to have completed for 0.1.0 (about 6 months from now).

#### History: Website Code
[web/commits/master](https://github.com/remapscotland/web/commits/master)
Here is the history log of all commits to the web repository thus far. Every change to the
[web](https://github.com/remapscotland/web) repository is shown as soon as it happens on this feed (you can add this to an RSS feed reader or bookmark it to make sure we are not slacking too much ;-) or to identify the commit which has changed a site feature you want to ask about or browse the code of.

#### History: Everything
[organizations/remapscotland](https://github.com/organizations/remapscotland)
The RSS Feed of all updates in here. Not just the repositories but the wiki and bug tracker/milestone updates appear here as they happen.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
